content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->12->3

The shortest path from node 11 to node 3 in the given graph is 1->2->12->3. Note that this shortest path traverses two intermediate nodes (nodes 2 and 12) but avoids the longest possible path by going directly to node 3.

1->12

The shortest path from node 11 to node 12 in the given graph is 1->12. Note that this shortest path traverses only one intermediate node (node 12) and avoids going to a different node (node 11) first.
